title: Probability Distribution Function (PDF) for a Discrete Random Variable
body: Complete the table using the data provided. A company wants to evaluate its attrition rate, in other words, how long new hires stay with the company. Over the years, they have established the following probability distribution. Let X $$=$$ the number of years a new hire will stay with the company.\nLet P(x) $$=$$ the probability that a new hire will stay with the company $$x$$ years.\n##figure1.gif
lesson: 4.1 Probability Distribution Function (PDF) for a Discrete Random Variable
